title: Intensive Summer School Program
description: Week-long intensive program covering green additive manufacturing, sustainability principles, and hands-on projects. Open to students and professionals from all partner institutions.
content_markdown:
## Immersive Learning Experience

Join us for an intensive **5-day summer school** focused on green additive manufacturing technologies, sustainability principles, and practical applications.

## Program Overview

### Day 1: Foundations
- Introduction to additive manufacturing
- Sustainability in production
- Material science basics
- Lab tour and orientation

### Day 2: Green Materials
- Biodegradable polymers
- Recycled materials in AM
- Material testing workshop
- Guest lecture: Industry innovations

### Day 3: Design for Sustainability
- Eco-design principles
- Life cycle assessment
- CAD software training
- Group project kickoff

### Day 4: Advanced Techniques
- Multi-material printing
- Energy optimization
- Post-processing methods
- Project development time

### Day 5: Applications & Presentation
- Case studies from industry
- Group project presentations
- Feedback and evaluation
- Certificate ceremony

## What's Included

- All teaching materials and access to equipment
- Coffee breaks and lunches
- Social dinner on Day 3
- Certificate of completion (30 hours)
- Accommodation assistance (not included in fee)

## Target Audience

- **Students**: Graduate and advanced undergraduate
- **Professionals**: Engineers, designers, educators
- **Researchers**: Early-career scientists

### Prerequisites

- Basic knowledge of CAD software (recommended)
- Interest in sustainability and manufacturing
- Laptop with design software installed

## Registration

**Early Bird (until May 1)**: €200  
**Regular (after May 1)**: €250  
**Partner institution students**: €150

**Program runs**: July 5-9, 2026 | 09:00-17:00 daily

*Limited to 25 participants - register early!*
